sourcesContent:
Programming books list!

{{iname}}

  • {{ name }} by {{ author }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-books', templateUrl: './books.component.html', styleUrls: ['./books.component.css'] }) export class BooksComponent { name:string = "Clean code"; author:string="Robert C"; img_src:string="https://m.media-amazon.com/images/W/WEBP_402378-T2/images/I/71UoqmNAv8L._AC_UY218_.jpg" isDisabled:boolean=false handleClick(){ console.log("hello") this.isDisabled=true } iname :string=""; handleInput(event:any){ this.iname= event.target.value } isShowing:boolean=true; toggleBook(){ this.isShowing =!this.isShowing; } books = [{ name: "Clean code", author:"Robert C", img_src:"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/W/WEBP_402378-T2/images/I/71UoqmNAv8L._AC_UY218_.jpg" }] }
